Modification:
• Removed requirement for Data Partner to have at least one year of data available before package begins identifying infants
  • Relaxed infant enrollment criteria to at least 1 day in the first three years of life
  • Relaxed mother enrollment requirements from 180 days of prior enrollment to 90

• Bug fix to correct an error which resulted in the exclusion of Mothers and Infants whose race was marked as 'M'
  • Bug fix to allow package to correctly handle BIRTH_TYPE = '6'
Bug fix to correct yearmonth formatting in infants aggregation dataset
Updated for compliance with Sentinel Common Data Model v8.0.0
Addition of stratification for yearmonth in deliveries_counts and infants_counts aggregate datasets
